segments.advisor_message: So, let's start off by discussing your objectives today. What specific goals or topics do you want to focus on during our session?
segments.client_message: Um, right. So, I want to maybe talk about retirement planning and possibly, like, investing in real estate. Those are my main goals.

segments.advisor_message: Got it! Retirement planning and real estate investment are great topics. Could you also share your current investment sources or any financial sources you're using?
segments.client_message: Uh, well, I have a 401(k), and I've been thinking about investing in a few mutual funds, but, uh, I’m not too sure what else is out there.
